snippet: HAMBURGER--Neil. We mourn the loss of Neil Hamburger, dynamic father of our dear and beloved friend Brad Hamburger. We extend our love and prayers to Kathy, Brad and Jill, and Wendy and Steven. Debra and Stephen Weiss 1/3
lead_paragraph: HAMBURGER--Neil. We mourn the loss of Neil Hamburger, dynamic father of our dear and beloved friend Brad Hamburger. We extend our love and prayers to Kathy, Brad and Jill, and Wendy and Steven. Debra and Stephen Weiss 1/3
